column1: Kata Robata////The only time I ever go to Kata Robata is when taking Greenway Plaza business clients for lunch
column2: because I am very poor and unable to eat there with my own money. The lunch time at this place is pretty good. The hostess moves pretty fast and assigning the seating for the customers. At the front
column3: there's the special for the day displayed there. Both time visiting here for lunch
column4: we were seated promptly and as soon as we sat
column6: introduce him or herself and took our drink order.
